modName: Alteration - Instantly Cast Dragonhide --- 1H and 2H version
summary: Cast Dragonhide as fast as casting Oakflesh! Also lasts 60 seconds now.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

I made this simple mod because I usually wear robes that have low or no armor rating at all. I love Dragonhide for allowing me to ignore 80% physical damage but I hated having to recast it frequently to avoid being killed. So [B][U]I decreased the cast time to 0 and increased the duration to 60 seconds.[/U][/B]

I made two versions: 1-handed and 2-handed. Personally, I use the 1-handed version because I like to wield something else in the other hand. But if you feel that it would be too overpowered, I made a 2-handed version to make it seem fair.

Choose 1 version and put it in your /Skyrim/Data folder. This mod doesn\'t add Dragonhide to your character; you still have to do the Alteration Ritual Quest to get it.
author: dnlphm94
